resources.string: B菌：可分泌En、bgl酶（分解1个低聚糖成为3个葡萄糖）
C菌：可分泌Colicin E1（消耗1个葡萄糖分泌Colicin E1获得其他菌3个糖，选择发动，1回合限1次）
D菌：可分泌Colicin N（消耗1个葡萄糖分泌Colicin E1获得其他菌2个糖，选择发动，1回合2次）
A菌：可分泌Ex酶（分解1个纤维素成为2个低聚糖）

After starting the game, each of the four players selected the bacteria they want to use (a bacteria can only be selected once)


The game is played in the order of ABCD bacteria


Click Start Turn when you reach your turn


Click on the start turn to launch the skills by clicking on the role card


Click on the trade to enter the trading stage, you can choose to replace your own resources


Click End, End Round and end consumption settlement



Round start


Get two resources from the environment at random.

Role skills

 Bacteria A - Ex enzymes can be secreted (breaking down 1 cellulose into 2 low-sugar)

 B bacteria - can secrete En gl enzymes (break down 1 oligosaccharides to become 3 glucose)

 C bacteria - can secrete Colicin E1 (consumption of 1 glucose secretion Colicin E1 Get 3 sugars from other bacteria, choose to start,1 turn limited to 1 time)

 D bacteria - can secrete Colicin N(consume 1 glucose secretion Colicin E1 Get other bacteria 2 sugars, choose to start,1 round 2 times)

Trading phase

 Click on glucose to exchange a cellulose or oligosaccharides randomly with other bacteria

 Click cellulose to exchange a glucose with other bacteria

 Click on polysaccharide to exchange a glucose for other bacteria

 Trade up to two times per round, trading is not necessarily successful, and there will even be trades that go back

Consumption phase

 Bacteria consume one glucose, and if the amount of glucose is less than one, the game fails

 Settlement

 1. Only one player survives when the game ends and he becomes the winner

 2. Limited resources in the environment, when all the glucose is consumed and the game ends, the player with the most glucose wins
